product_name: Avid BB7 Road SL Disc Brake
long_description: Light and powerful, the Avid BB7 Road SL mechanical disc brake offers a road-specific upgrade for responsive braking and a lightweight advantage over other disc brake systems. With easily accessible adjustment knobs and lightweight hardware, the Avid BB7 Road SL disc brake provides stopping power and easy pad alignment. Tri-Align Caliper Positioning System(TM) aligns caliper easily for fast, simple installation and adjustment. Features inboard and outboard pad adjustment knobs, rigid 2-piece forged body and tool-free pad replacement. Integrated cable stop prevents routing cable and housing from entering the brake at odd angles, reducing the possibility of cable drag. Includes a 6-bolt heat-dissipating HS-1 rotor and alloy-backed brake pads that use a lightweight organic compound. Titanium bolts help shed weight. Avid BB7 Road SL mechanical disc brake is optimized for use with short-pull, road style levers (e.g. STI, drop, canti); levers not included. Caliper is 74mm; adapter for 51mm International Standard brake mounts is included. Can be mounted front or rear; choose between either 140mm or 160mm rotor sizes.
